edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random

Class SliceRandOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
        • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random.SliceRandOM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstOrderSliceRandOM, GroundSliceRandOM

    public abstract class SliceRandOM
extends WeightLearningApplication
    Abstract class that learns new weights for the CompatibilityKernels in a Model using slice-sampling MCEM RandOM learning.
